title: Mahogany Finish Spiked Cemetery Flower Vase By ForeverSafe Products Occasional Vase
features: The only durable, re-usable Cemetery Vase that does not require a canister
Vase able to stand alone in service, Can be used with the stake graveside
Attractive color options available to accomodate a variety of colors
description: The ForeverSafe Occasional Collection is a line of spiked cemetery flower vases that are attractive, reusable and beautifully designed for a variety of purposes, including the ability to have a cemetery flower vase at a loved ones memorial or headstone without the requirements of a costly, cemetery flower vase canister. ForeverSafe is the name you trust for high quality replacement cemetery flower vases when families are hesitant to replace with bronze or other precious metals, which are being targeted by scrap metal thieves all around the country. But what about the immediate need of having a vase stolen or families that would like to place flowers at a grave with no vase? The ForeverSafe Occasional Vase immediately solves these issues.
